revision.text:
[[File:DragonScale.png|thumb|200px|The Dragon Scale]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Dragon Scale costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Blackthorn City]] in [[Johto]]. It can also be found after defeating Wild Dratini.
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Seadra.png|40px]] Seadra || [[File:Kingdra.png|40px]] Kingdra |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
